docs.title: Welcome to Custom MkDocs DocumentationModern Documentation
docs.text:
Built with custom theme, PostCSS, and GitHub Actions

Get Started

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
🎨 Custom Theme

Beautiful, responsive design with custom HTML, CSS, and JavaScript components.

⚡ Fast Build

Optimized build pipeline with PostCSS, HTML validation, and asset minification.

🚀 Auto Deploy

Automatic deployment to GitHub Pages with every push to main branch.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/Dobrunia/mkdocs.git
cd mkdocs

# Install dependencies
pip install mkdocs mkdocs-material

docs.title: Development
docs.text:
# Start development server
mkdocs serve

# Build static site
mkdocs build

docs.title: Deployment
docs.text: The site automatically deploys to GitHub Pages when you push to the main branch.

docs.title: Examples
docs.text: This page demonstrates various features and components available in the custom MkDocs theme.

docs.title: Python
docs.text:
def fibonacci(n):
    """Calculate the nth Fibonacci number."""
    if n <= 1:
        return n
    return fibonacci(n-1) + fibonacci(n-2)

# Example usage
for i in range(10):
    print(f"F({i}) = {fibonacci(i)}")

docs.title: JavaScript
docs.text:
// Modern JavaScript with ES6+ features
class DocumentationSite {
  constructor(name, url) {
    this.name = name;
    this.url = url;
    this.initialized = false;
  }

  async initialize() {
    try {
      await this.loadAssets();
      this.setupEventListeners();
      this.initialized = true;
      console.log(`${this.name} initialized successfully`);
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('Initialization failed:', error);
    }
  }

  loadAssets() {
    return new Promise((resolve) => {
      // Simulate asset loading
      setTimeout(resolve, 1000);
    });
  }

  setupEventListeners() {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
      this.onDOMReady();
    });
  }

  onDOMReady() {
    console.log('DOM is ready!');
  }
}

// Usage
const site = new DocumentationSite('Custom MkDocs', 'https://example.com');
site.initialize();

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Welcome to the Custom MkDocs Documentation! This guide will help you get up and running quickly.

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
Before you begin, make sure you have the following installed:

  • Python 3.7 or higher
  • pip (Python package installer)
  • Git

docs.title: 1. Clone the Repository
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/Dobrunia/mkdocs.git
cd mkdocs

docs.title: 2. Install Dependencies
docs.text:
# Install MkDocs and required plugins
pip install mkdocs mkdocs-material

# Install additional dependencies for custom theme
pip install pymdown-extensions

docs.title: 3. Verify Installation
docs.text: mkdocs --version

docs.title: Start Development Server
docs.text:
mkdocs serve

This will start a local development server at http://127.0.0.1:8000 with live reloading enabled.

docs.title: Build Static Site
docs.text:
mkdocs build

This creates a site/ directory with the static HTML files.

docs.title: Configuration
docs.text:
The main configuration is in mkdocs.yml:

site_name: Custom MkDocs Documentation
site_description: A modern documentation site
site_author: Documentation Team

theme:
  name: custom_theme
  custom_dir: mkdocs_theme/custom_theme

extra_css:
  - assets/css/main.css
  - assets/css/custom.css

extra_javascript:
  - assets/js/main.js

docs.title: Adding Pages
docs.text:
1. Create a new Markdown file in the docs/ directory
  2. Add it to the navigation in mkdocs.yml

docs.text:
• Main styles: assets/css/main.css
  • Custom styles: assets/css/custom.css
  • JavaScript: assets/js/main.js

  • Page template: mkdocs_theme/custom_theme/main.html

docs.title: Deployment
docs.text: The site automatically deploys to GitHub Pages when you push to the main branch.

docs.title: Manual Deployment
docs.text:
# Build the site
mkdocs build

# Deploy to GitHub Pages
mkdocs gh-deploy

docs.title: Common Issues
docs.text:
1. Theme not found: Make sure the mkdocs_theme/ directory exists
  2. CSS not loading: Check that the paths in mkdocs.yml are correct
  3. Build errors: Run mkdocs build --strict to see detailed error messages
